original_title: 映画おじゃる丸 約束の夏 おじゃるとせみら
overview: This short film introduces Semira, a strange boy who comes to play with Ojaru and his chums and bears a marked resemblance to a boy of the same name who spent a summer with the village elders when they were boys, long ago.
title: Prince Mackaroo the Movie: The Promised Summer - Ojaru and Semira
